summary: The diff shows only a modification to project_state.json (metadata tracking file), with no implementation of the Viper Elite gaming mouse product. The actual requirement to add the product to frontend/src/data/products.ts is completely missing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new Viper Elite gaming mouse product to the mice array in frontend/src/data/products.ts with name, description, price, and specifications following the existing product data structure
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows changes to project_state.json (a metadata file). There are no changes to frontend/src/data/products.ts where the Viper Elite product should be added.
